p: Microstructures of AISI 4340 for all deformation temperatures and two limiting values of deformation rates are in Figure 15 ( φ’ = 10 s −1) and Figure 16 ( φ’ = 0.001 s −1). The deformation temperature has a significant influence on the grain size [ 46]. In both shown cases of strain rates, grain size increases in proportion to temperature. This effect is more noticeable as the deformation rate decreases.
